bicep-curls.name: Bicep Curls
instructions: Curl weights up while keeping elbows still

hammer-curls.name: Hammer Curls
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms facing each other
Keep elbows close to body throughout movement
Curl weights up while maintaining neutral grip
Lower with control to starting position

tricep-pushdowns.name: Tricep Pushdowns
instructions: Stand facing cable machine, grip bar at chest height
Push bar down until arms fully extended
Control weight back to starting position

preacher-curls.name: Preacher Curls
instructions: Sit at preacher bench with armpits against top pad
Curl weight up with controlled motion
Lower weight slowly to full extension
